title: Présumé innocent: l'affaire Sébastien Métivier
overview: Marie-Claude Savard and Sébastien Trudel delve into one of Québec's most high-profile kidnapping stories of the 1980s. Sébastien Métivier and Wilton Lubin, aged 8 and 12, disappeared after participating in an after-school activity a short distance from their home. 40 years later, these cases remain unresolved.
